meanings.def: an official document that may be used to prove that the facts it states are true
examples: certificate of something a certificate of motor insurance
The police are waiting for the doctor to issue a death certificate.
She showed her certificate of insurance.
Everyone entering the country needs to show a health certificate.
This certificate is an important document. Keep it in a safe place.

meanings.def: an official document proving that you have completed a course of study or passed an exam; a qualification obtained after a course of study or an exam
examples: a Postgraduate Certificate in Education (= a British qualification for teachers)
certificate of something A certificate of completion will be issued to all who complete the course.

meanings.def: to give somebody an official document proving that they have successfully completed a training course, especially for a particular profession
